profile.name: Abbey Kelley
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer & Creative Technologist
profile.subtitle: Building powerful web applications with modern frameworks and cloud technologies.
bio: I'm Abbey Kelley, a full-stack developer passionate about building scalable web applications and exploring the latest technologies. With expertise spanning front-end frameworks to cloud infrastructure, I love solving complex problems through elegant code.

My technical toolkit includes React, Node.js, Python, and modern cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. I'm equally comfortable designing intuitive user interfaces with Figma and deploying containerized applications with Docker.
Whether it's developing full-stack applications, working with databases, or creating beautiful designs, I approach every project with curiosity and a commitment to continuous learning.

projects.title: Video Game Exchange
projects.description: A full-stack platform for trading and exchanging video games, featuring user authentication, real-time notifications, and a responsive interface.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Modern e-commerce solution with secure payment processing, inventory management, and admin dashboard built with Node.js and React.

projects.title: Task Manager Pro
projects.description: Cross-platform productivity app with smart task prioritization, team collaboration features, and cloud synchronization.

projects.title: Microservices Architecture
projects.description: Scalable microservices deployment on AWS using Docker containers, with automated CI/CD pipeline and monitoring.

projects.title: RESTful API Service
projects.description: High-performance REST API built with FastAPI, featuring JWT authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive documentation.

projects.title: Design System Library
projects.description: Comprehensive design system with reusable components, built in Figma and implemented with React and TailwindCSS.
